name: ocaml
description: OCaml Compiler as an Npm Package
personal-workflow-for-committing-force-p: git add package.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag -d npm-4.02.3 && git tag npm-4.02.3 && git push -f upstream HEAD:create4_02_3_with_packageJson && git push -f upstream --tags

pjc.build: ./configure -no-cfi -prefix $ocaml__install && make -j world.opt && make install && make clean
